attributes.action: stop or intervene on the planned march through wootton bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
no to the planned islam 4 uk march through wootton bassett
THIS GROUP IS TO STOP THE PROPOSED MARCH BY ISLAM4UK EXTREMISTS THROUGH THE TOWN OF WB....

THE HIGHWAY FOR HEROES & WONDERFUL PEOPLE OF WB DO NOT DESERVE THIS MARCH TO HAPPEN.

THIS GROUP CAN MARCH ANYWHERE IT WISHES IN THE COUNTRY BUT HAVE CHOSEN WB TO CAUSE OUTRAGE & OFFENCE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
